name: Rookie Smite
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up a blunt weapon could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with blunt weapons.

name: Standard Smite
description: A normal attack on center mass. Your basic damaging move to use at low poise.

name: Quick Smite
description: A fast, balanced attack. A standard way to gain poise and deal damage at the same time.

name: Heavy Smite
description: A powerful attack. A standard heavy attack to use at high poise.

name: Deft Smite
description: A medium powered but fast attack. An alternative to Standard Smite that costs less poise but doesn't have accuracy.

name: Heft Smite
description: An attack at a weak point. An alternative to Standard Smite that sacrifices accuracy for critical strike chance.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Precision Smite
description: An especially accurate attack. At a little higher poise cost, this move buys some additional accuracy over Standard Smite.

name: Guard
description: You focus on defense. An early option for tank characters that doesn't require a shield.
effects: * The next attack on you before your next turn deals half damage

name: A Knight's Focus
description: You concentrate and work to gain momentum. The highest poise generation move in the moveset.

name: Gigabreak
description: A very powerful attack. Your standard move to use at very high poise.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Stalwart Smite
description: An attack combined with the defense of a shield. A very efficient way to deal damage and keep your defenses up.
effects: * You have +2 AC until the end of the next round

name: Retreating Smite
description: An attack while pulling back. An excellent option to maneuver backwards while keeping your guard up.
effects: * Until the end of this round, you have +1 AC

name: Advancing Smite
description: An attack while marching forward. A respectable option for forward movement.

name: Trained Warrior
description: You invoke previous training. A low cost buff to both offense and defense.
effects: * You have +1 to hit and +1 AC until the end of the next round

name: Battlemaster
description: You are a master at battle. A high cost buff to both offense and defense
effects: * You have +2 to hit and +2 AC until the end of the next round

name: We Fight Together
description: You and an ally work together to gain momentum. A powerful option to grant an ally poise while gaining some poise yourself.
effects: * Target ally in the same line as you gains +10 Poise

name: Get Behind Me
description: You bodyblock for a teammate. A strong way to protect an ally.
effects: * Target ally in the same line as you may maneuver 1 line forward or backward
* Until the end of the next round, attacks against the same target ally are redirected to you

name: Leading Smite
description: An attack that creates an opportunity for another. A powerful support attack, but make sure that the character acting after you is an ally.
effects: * The character that acts next has +1 to hit and +1D damage

name: Scramble
description: You quickly reposition along with an ally. A strong way to move from one end of the battlefield to another while helping out an ally.
additional_requirements: * You are in either the frontline or backline
effects: * If you are in the frontline, you swap positions with an ally in the backline
* Alternatively, if you are in the backline, you swap positions with an ally in the frontline

name: Barrage
description: Repeated attacks against a single target. An efficient damage dealing option as long as you don't switch targets
effects: * This attack has +1d6 damage if this move was used during your last turn against the same target

name: Anklebreaker
description: An attack that breaks bones in the legs. A powerful option if you anticipate enemy repositioning moves.
effects: * The target may not maneuver this round

name: Dual Tactics
description: You and a teammate work together. A buff that effectively grants accuracy for 3 moves: one for you and 2 for an ally. With some target focusing, this accuracy bonus is improved.
effects: * You an a target ally in the same line or in an adjacent line gain +1 to hit until the end of the next round
* This bonus is increased to +2 to hit when one of you attacks a target damaged by the other in the same round

name: Burst Smite
description: An attack that causes a localized burst of damage. A somewhat delayed option for AOE damage that the enemy could play around if they predict it.
effects: * At the end of the round, enemies in the same line as the target take 2d6 damage

name: Stonesmasher
description: An attack that shatters boulders. To be used when enemies are making use of large rocks as cover.
effects: * This attack ignores cover from large rocks and destroys them

name: Cannonball Smite
description: An attack that invokes the power of the ocean. A powerful AOE attack when fighting in waterlogged biomes like swamps or open sea.
additional_requirements: * You are in a water biome
effects: * If this attack is used against a target in the midline and successfully deals damage to them, it hits all other enemies without checking against their AC

name: Spelunking Smite
description: An attack invoking the power of the caverns. A strong option for forced movement while delving into caves.
additional_requirements: * You are in a cave biome
effects: * The target is pushed 1 line backward.
* If possible, a target behind the initial target is pushed 1 line backward also

name: Penetrating Smite
description: An attack that crushes defenses. A useful attack if enemies are using many defensive buffs.
effects: * This attack ignores the target's temporary AC bonuses

name: Adamantium Armor
description: Your armor covers your weak points well. A strong defensive option against axe and shortblade users to blunt their critical strikes.
additional_requirements: * You are wearing light or heavy armor
effects: * Until the end of the next round, you ignore the effects of critical strikes against you

name: Comeback Smite
description: An attack against fast enemies. A decent poise damaging move that excels when your turn is low in poise order.
effects: * If the target has already acted this round, they lose 10 poise instead

name: Vengeant Smite
description: An attack powered by revenge. A powerful damage option for those expecting incoming attacks.
effects: * If this attack is used against a target that attacked you this round, it deals +2d6 damage.
* If the target scored a critical strike when they attacked you, this attack deals +3d6 damage instead

name: Sorcerous Smite
description: An attack powered by ambient mana. A solid damage dealing option when an ally is casting spells alongside you.
effects: * This attack deals +2d6 damage if an ally in the same line cast a spell this round.

name: Antimagic Bulwark
description: You are good at using your shield to deflect magic. A powerful defensive option against spellcasters.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, magic attacks against you deal half damage

name: Stunning Smite
description: An attack aimed at the head. A basic option to stun enemies.

name: One For All
description: Your battlecry inspires everyone. The only move that affects your entire team's poise.

name: Stalwart
description: You stand your ground. A defensive option that is useful against enemies using forced movement attacks often.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, you cannot be forced to maneuver by an enemy's attack

name: Goad
description: You provoke an enemy to approach you. A useful way to pull enemies hiding in the midline and backline forward.

name: Bowbreaker
description: An attack against archers. A powerful counter to ranged weapon wielding enemies.
effects: * This attack has +1 to hit and +2d6 damage if the target is wielding a ranged weapon

name: Shoving Smite
description: An attack that forces an enemy to retreat. A useful way to push frontline enemies towards the rear.
effects: * The target is pushed 1 line backward

name: Dazzling Smite
description: An attack that disorients an enemy. A basic attack to hurt an enemy's accuracy.
effects: * Target has -1 to hit until the end of the round

name: Broken But Not Beaten
description: An attack by a wounded animal. A powerful comeback attack when your health is low.
effects: * If you have 10 health or less, this attack deals +2d6 damage and the target loses an additional 5 poise. The target is also inflicted with -1D until the end of the next round.

name: Comet Crush
description: Your weapon is like a falling comet. An alternative to Gigabreak that sacrifices damage for a chance to stun

name: Unbreakable
description: You defend while pushing for momentum. A poise generation option that has great potential if you have confidence in your defenses.
effects: * You have +1 AC until the beginning of your next turn
* Until the beginning of your next turn, when an attack against you fails to beat your AC, you gain +5 poise

name: Taunt
description: You force enemies to focus on you. A powerful option to actively tank for your team.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, the target's attacks that are not directed at you cause them to take 2d6 damage and lose 10 poise

name: Right Hand Man
description: You support your strongest fighter. A great support move when paired with a good damage dealer like an axe or shortblade user.
effects: * The next ally to attack the target gains one level of advantage on their attack; if their attack is a critical strike, you and that ally gain +20 poise

name: Heavenly Smite
description: An attack from high ground. A powerful option that can force an enemy into a bad spot.
additional_requirements: * You have a height advantage over your target
effects: * Target is pushed to the backline

name: Avalanche
description: An attack that displaces loose snow. A great option to control an enemy team while fighting in a snowy region.
effects: * If you are standing in snow, this attack inflicts -1 to hit to all enemies without checking against their AC

name: Countersmite
description: An attack that breaks concentration. A useful way to prevent enemy spellcasters from acting if you can anticipate their moves.
effects: * Target fails to cast spells this round

name: Regroup
description: You call allies to you. A useful way to move multiple allies.
effects: * Target ally in the frontline maneuvers 1 line backward
* Target ally in the backline maneuvers 1 line forward

name: Invocation Armor
description: You invoke the true power of your armor. A way to temporarily improve your natural defenses from your gear
effects: * Until the end of the next round, defenses bonuses from your gear are doubled

name: Paragon
description: You show why you were chosen by the gods. A powerful recovery option that can be used once per day
additional_requirements: * You have rested at least once since you last executed this move
effects: * The next attack that hits you is fully negated; until that occurs, you recover 10% of your maximum health at the end of each of your turns
